timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: Explicit session flush is quite extreme? Can you add a comment why it is required?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText: Removing the flushing but the one that is called when the user select the option to flush every time and object is added.
replies.author: enricocolasante

timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: This class converts objects from one type to another, do we need to run the conversion in a database TX? Can't we cache the lookup data and run outside a tx?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText:
Transactional here was completely wrong.
Removing it
replies.author: enricocolasante

timeline.bodyText: Lots of flushing :) why can't we delegate the flushing to hibernate?
